physical_appearance:\The image shows a poster. It is rectangular in shape and \\hello girlfriend\\ is displayed in pink letters at the top centre of the poster. The poster consists of 10 photographs and each of these photographs feature a different woman. Some of the photographs are close-up shots which capture only the faces of the women while others feature their upper torso and the background as well. The poster was designed by \\fFurious\\.
